summary: The conversation is between an AI assistant and a customer service representative from the "Lean Dean Club" platform. The customer had previously invested on their B2B lending platform and the representative is calling to address any doubts or queries the customer may have regarding the investment.
questions_asked: - "Do you have any client in chennai?"
overall_sentiment:
Neutral
The customer was mostly interested in checking if the company had any clients in Chennai, which the representative initially did not have information about, but eventually confirmed that they did have many clients there.
